gw.api.databuilder

Class ActivityPatternBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<T,B>
      • gw.api.databuilder.CCDataBuilder<ActivityPattern,ActivityPatternBuilder>
        • gw.api.databuilder.ActivityPatternBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueGenerator<ActivityPattern>

    public class ActivityPatternBuilder
extends CCDataBuilder<ActivityPattern,ActivityPatternBuilder>

      • Fields inherited from class gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder

        DEFAULT_ORDER

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActivityPatternBuilder()
      Creates a new ActivityPatternBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ActivityPatternBuilder uiReadyGeneralTaskActivityPatternBuilder()
      Creates a UI ready activity pattern of "general" type and "task" class with all the required fields set: Subject - a unique string starting with "Subject" Code - a unique string starting with "Code" Mandatory - false AutomatedOnly - false ClosedClaimAvlble - false Recurring - false Priority - random Priority typecode Importance - random ImportanceLevel typecode Note that if you set the TargetIncludeDays to IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS then TargetBusCalType becomes required and you must specify a value.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withActivityClass(ActivityClass activityClass)
      Sets the class of the activity.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withAutomatedOnly(boolean automatedOnly)
      Sets the true if the activity pattern is used only by automated additions to the workplan.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withCategory(ActivityCategory category)
      Sets the category used to organize the activity pattern.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withClaimLossType(LossType claimLossType)
      Sets the used to optionally filter activity patterns by claim loss type.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withClosedClaimAvlble(boolean closedClaimAvlble)
      Sets the true if the activity pattern is available for closed claims.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withCode(java.lang.String code)
      Sets the concise name of the activity pattern, used to identify the pattern within rules.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withCommand(java.lang.String command)
      Sets the a Gosu command to execute for this activity.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withDescription(java.lang.String description)
      Sets the description of the activity pattern.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withDocumentTemplate(java.lang.String documentTemplate)
      Sets the id of an associated document template.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEmailTemplate(java.lang.String emailTemplate)
      Sets the id of an associated email template.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTag(HolidayTagCode escalationBusCalTag)
      Sets the holiday tag code to use for business calendar in calculating EscalationDate, if applicable.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalType(BusCalType busCalType)
      Sets the escalation business calendar type (used only if EscalationInclDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeCompanyHolidays()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "Company Holidays" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeFederalHolidays()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "Federal Holidays" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeGeneral()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "General" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeLossLocation()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "Claim Loss Location" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationDays(int escalationDays)
      Sets the used in conjunction with EscalationStartPoint and EscalationIncludedDays to calculate the EscalationDate of the activity.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationHours(int escalationHours)
      Sets the used in conjunction with EscalationStartPoint and EscalationIncludedDays to calculate the EscalationDate of the activity.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationInclDays(IncludeDaysType escalationInclDays)
      Sets the which days to include in calculating the EscalationDate.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationStartPt(StartPointType escalationStartPt)
      Sets the which existing date on the activity or associated claim to use as the starting date for the EscalationDate.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withEscBusCalLocPath(java.lang.String escBusCalLocPath)
      Sets the location bean path to use for business calendar in calculating EscalationDate, if applicable.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withExternallyOwned(boolean externallyOwned)
      Sets the whether the activity is externally owned.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withImportance(ImportanceLevel importance)
      Sets the importance level of the activity.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withLocalizedDescription(java.lang.String languageCode, java.lang.String description)
      Sets the description of the activity pattern.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withLocalizedSubject(java.lang.String languageCode, java.lang.String subject)
      Set the localized value for the subject field, in the locale corresponding to the given language code
      ActivityPatternBuilder withMandatory(boolean mandatory)
      Sets the whether completion of the activity is mandatory.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withOrganization(Organization organization)
      Sets the organization which owns this activity pattern
      ActivityPatternBuilder withOrganization(ValueGenerator<? extends Organization> organization)
      Sets the organization which owns this activity pattern
      ActivityPatternBuilder withPriority(Priority priority)
      Sets the priority of the activity with respect to other activities.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withRecurring(boolean recurring)
      Sets the whether this activity is recurring.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withShortSubject(java.lang.String shortSubject)
      Sets the short subject field of the activity.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withSubject(java.lang.String subject)
      Sets the subject field of the activity.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetBusCalLocPath(java.lang.String targetBusCalLocPath)
      Sets the location bean path to use for business calendar in calculating TargetDate, if applicable.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetBusCalTag(HolidayTagCode targetBusCalTag)
      Sets the holiday tag code to use for business calendar in calculating TargetDate, if applicable.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetBusCalType(BusCalType busCalType)
      Sets the target business calendar type (used only if TargetIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetBusCalTypeCompanyHolidays()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "Company Holidays" (used only if TargetIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetBusCalTypeFederalHolidays()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "Federal Holidays" (used only if TargetIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetBusCalTypeGeneral()
      Sets the target business calendar type to "General" (used only if TargetIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).

      Sets the target business calendar type to "Claim Loss Location" (used only if TargetIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS).
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetDays(int targetDays)
      Sets the used in conjunction with TargetStartPoint and TargetIncludedDays to calculate the ActionDate of the activity.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetHours(int targetHours)
      Sets the used in conjunction with TargetStartPoint and TargetIncludedDays to calculate the ActionDate of the activity.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetIncludeDays(IncludeDaysType targetIncludeDays)
      Sets the which days to include in calculating the TargetDate.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withTargetStartPoint(StartPointType targetStartPoint)
      Sets the which existing date on the activity or associated claim to use as the starting date for the TargetDate.
      ActivityPatternBuilder withType(ActivityType type)
      Sets the type of the activity.

      Set a unique string for the code that starts with "Code"

      Sets the importance level of the activity to a unique value
      ActivityPatternBuilder withUniquePriority()
      Sets the priority to a unique value
      ActivityPatternBuilder withUniqueSubject()
      Set a unique string as the subject, starting with "Subject"

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActivityPatternBuilder

        public ActivityPatternBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • uiReadyGeneralTaskActivityPatternBuilder

        public static ActivityPatternBuilder uiReadyGeneralTaskActivityPatternBuilder()
        Creates a UI ready activity pattern of "general" type and "task" class with all the required fields set:
        • Subject - a unique string starting with "Subject"
        • Code - a unique string starting with "Code"
        • Mandatory - false
        • AutomatedOnly - false
        • ClosedClaimAvlble - false
        • Recurring - false
        • Priority - random Priority typecode
        • Importance - random ImportanceLevel typecode
        Note that if you set the TargetIncludeDays to IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS then TargetBusCalType becomes required and you must specify a value. Likewise if you set EscalationIncludeDays to IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS then EscalationBusCalType becomes required.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • withActivityClass

        public ActivityPatternBuilder withActivityClass(ActivityClass activityClass)
        Sets the class of the activity.
        Parameters:
        activityClass - the desired value
        Returns:
        the modified builder

      • withAutomatedOnly

        public ActivityPatternBuilder withAutomatedOnly(boolean automatedOnly)
        Sets the true if the activity pattern is used only by automated additions to the workplan. If true, the pattern won't be shown as an option for users to choose in the application's interface.
        Parameters:
        automatedOnly - the desired value
        Returns:
        the modified builder

        public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeCompanyHolidays()

        Returns:
        the modified builder

      • withEscalationBusCalTypeGeneral

        public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeGeneral()
        Sets the target business calendar type to "General" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS). See ActivityPattern.setEscalationBusCalType(gw.api.activity.BusCalType)
        Returns:
        the modified builder

      • withEscalationBusCalTypeFederalHolidays

        public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeFederalHolidays()
        Sets the target business calendar type to "Federal Holidays" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS). See ActivityPattern.setEscalationBusCalType(gw.api.activity.BusCalType)
        Returns:
        the modified builder

      • withEscalationBusCalTypeLossLocation

        public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalTypeLossLocation()
        Sets the target business calendar type to "Claim Loss Location" (used only if EscalationIncludeDays is IncludeDaysType.TC_BUSINESSDAYS). NOTE the display string for this type will always be in English regardless of the locale of the server. See ActivityPattern.setEscalationBusCalType(gw.api.activity.BusCalType)
        Returns:
        the modified builder

      • withEscalationBusCalType

        public ActivityPatternBuilder withEscalationBusCalType(BusCalType busCalType)

        Parameters:
        busCalType - the BusCalType value
        Returns:
        the modified builder
